root: ^ME: This is Charlotte's diary. I should definitely not be reading this.

c-0: ^ ME: What she doesn't know won't hurt her..
c-1: ^ ME: Got to respect her privacy.

c-0: ^ ME: "Andy was being so cute today! He asked me whether I wanted to go on a date with him some time next week!"
^ME: "He proposed to go see the landing site of Apollo 11! How exciting!"
c-1: ^ ME: "Terrible day. I had a big argument with
^. Urgh, sometimes I just really can't stand
c-2: ^ ME: "Drank a bit too much last night. Hope I didn't do anything stupid."
c-3: ^ ME: "Today is the big day! We'll know who won the presidential election in the State! Although I already think I know.."
c-4: ^ ME: Got to respect her privacy.
